short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all mentions of blockchain with banana. Because it's funnier and an better source of potassium.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of hearing about how revolutionary the blockchain is? Don't care whether or not it'll change the world? 

Then I've got an extension for you...

BananaChain will replace all mentions of blockchain with banana. 
So now your feeds will be full of geeks talking about banana-powered technologies.
